definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
great meal fit for dragon's son (idiom); sumptuous banquet

sentences.english: And did you know that there are really zillions of ways to prepare a great seafood meal?
sentences.chinese: 你知道吗，准备一顿美好的海鲜大餐有无数种方法？

sentences.english: I just had a super-duper meal in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我刚刚在餐厅吃了一顿超级大餐。

sentences.english: “It’s like a home cooked meal for me, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “嘻哈音乐对我来说就像一顿家乡大餐，”他说。

sentences.english: We have to go out and eat the gourmet food to enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 要享受美味大餐，就得出去吃。

sentences.english: People get together with family and have turkey on Christmas Eve .
sentences.chinese: 人们在耶诞夜与家人团聚一起吃火鸡大餐。

sentences.english: Over the course of a year, you might even save enough money for a decent meal out.
sentences.chinese: 一年下来，也能省出一顿大餐了。

sentences.english: Deliver Thanksgiving dinners to housebound people.
sentences.chinese: 给行动不便的人们送上感恩大餐。

sentences.english: They got a great lunch for free.
sentences.chinese: 他们中午免费吃了一顿大餐。

sentences.english: I busied myself with shopping, then turned my attention to our Thanksgiving table.
sentences.chinese: 我忙着购物，然后一门心思都扑到感恩节大餐上。

sentences.english: However, the Joy Diet encourages you to indulge in feasts for the other senses as well.
sentences.chinese: 然而“快乐大餐”鼓励人们也享用其它感官的大餐。

sentences.english: However, the Joy Diet encourages you to indulge in feasts for the other senses as well.
sentences.chinese: 然而“快乐大餐”鼓励人们也享用其它感官的大餐。

sentences.english: Large meals tend to make you feel drowsy and sleepy afterwards. Try eating 5 small meals spaced throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 大餐会使你饭后昏昏欲睡，试着每天进5次小餐。

sentences.english: Don't compensate by scoffing a huge lunch.
sentences.chinese: 但不要过度补偿的去吃大餐。

sentences.english: We cooked a five-course meal on that little stove.
sentences.chinese: 我们在小炉子煮了一桌有五个主菜的丰盛大餐。

sentences.english: Back to Shanghai for what would be our last giant lazy-susan meal.
sentences.chinese: 回到上海，用了一顿最后的旋转餐台式大餐。

sentences.english: Having a seafood dinner on deck along beach, enjoying a windy and peaceful night at Balai.
sentences.chinese: 晚风中，潮水声中在浮脚长楼享用一顿海鲜大餐。

definition: great meal fit for dragon's son (idiom); sumptuous banquet
the Manchu Han imperial feast, a legendary banquet in the Qing dynasty/(fig.) a sumptuous banquet
delicacy and fine taste (idiom); a wonderful treat
delicacy and fine taste (idiom); a wonderful treat
